attributes.action: Appeal JOSHUA NICOLAS'(walney peadophile)sentence and sentence him accordingly!
attributes.background: Joshua Nicolas is a peadophile, found with indecent images of children. He escaped jail the first time but has offended again. The same judge has let him walk free AGAIN! This disgusting excuse of a human continued to download sick images of children and is free to do so again..maybe even worse!!!

rejection.details:
Sentences are the responsibility of the courts, which are independent of the Government and Parliament.

Anyone can ask the Attorney General to review a sentence they think is too low, and only one person needs to ask for a sentence to be reviewed. You can find out how to do that here:

https://www.gov.uk/complain-about-low-crown-court-sentence
